member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.InputStream
member.summary: An array of structures containing the set of references for video processing. If the stereo format is , then two sets of input streams must be supplied. For all other stereo formats, the first set of reference must be supplied, and the second should be zero initialized.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.Transform
member.summary: A structure specifying the flip, rotation, scale and destination translation for the video input.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.Flags
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying the options for the input stream.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.RateInfo
member.summary: A structure specifying the framerate and input and output indices for framerate conversion and deinterlacing.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.FilterLevels
member.summary: The level to apply for each enabled filter. The filter level is specified in the order that filters appear in the enumeration. Specify 0 if a filter is not enabled or the filter index is reserved.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.AlphaBlending
member.summary: A structure specifying the planar alpha for an input stream on the video processor.
